string.value: You can earn the #b<Ludus Lake Explorer>#k title by exploring the Ludus Lake region.
#b#eTitle - Ludus Lake Explorer#k#n\r\nExplore the 10 main regions of Ludus Lake.\r\n#bâ— Status : #R27012# / 10 Completed.
You have earned the #b<Ludus Lake Explorer>#k title for exploring various places in Ludus Lake.
You've finished exploring Ludus Lake. I will grant you the #b<Ludus Lake Explorer>#k title.
Ludibrium, Korean Folk Town, Omega Sector... aren't they all such beautiful places? Job well done, explorer. Keep up the good work and keep exploring other parts of Maple World!
Oh, you haven't finished exploring. Come back after you further explore Ludus Lake. The Ludus Lake region includes #bLudibrium, Omega Sector, and Korean Folk Town#k.
